channel.title: How do I make an Area Mutli?
channel.description: Well the Subject says it all but what I really mean is like you know when you attack a Monster and your friend can help you kill it where I want to know how to make an Area like that is there a TUT or a little snippet that I can put in to make it Mutli? Please post a Link or Snippet or Little TUT on how to do this Thank you so much and please dont flame me. I'm just trying to learn one step at a time. Also it is Delta. Thanks Mikey G.

item.title: How do I make an Area Mutli?
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Uncalled, post:3, topic:370270”][quote author=Ashton51 link=topic=466387.msg3410893#msg3410893 date=1290673809]

Well the Subject says it all but what I really mean is like you know when you attack a Monster and your friend can help you kill it where I want to know how to make an Area like that is there a TUT or a little snippet that I can put in to make it Mutli? Please post a Link or Snippet or Little TUT on how to do this Thank you so much and please dont flame me. I’m just trying to learn one step at a time. Also it is Delta.
Thanks
Mikey G.

find

public boolean inMulti() {

and at the end of the if statement, add

||(absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)

[/quote]
Not necessarily true actually, if it’s not in the wilderness you’d have to do more then just that.

Here’s the tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443474.msg3256385.html#msg3256385[/quote]

oh nvm, fergot its delta

Read full topic

find

public boolean inMulti() {

and at the end of the if statement, add

||(absX >= #### && absX <= #### && absY >= #### && absY <= ####)

Not necessarily true actually, if it’s not in the wilderness you’d have to do more then just that.

Here’s the tutorial: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,443474.msg3256385.html#msg3256385
